FuncDef: This command specifies the in-profile DSCP name for the forwarding class. The corresponding DSCP value will be used for all IP packets that require marking at egress on this forwarding class queue, and that are in-profile. The inplus-profile traffic is marked with the same value as in-profile traffic.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the system- or user-defined, case-sensitive dscp-name. Values-Any defined system- or user-defined dscp-name.
